attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Briton around 1 in 10 people self-harm according to statistics, many incidents of self-harm go unreported so the figure is probably much higher.
In America they have petitioned to make March 1st, Self-Harm Awareness Day, as figures for self harm are so high I think we should also make this an awareness day.
In short we should make March 1st an official Self-Harm Awareness Day and lead the fight on reducing self-harm.
